name: Iron Warfare: Theatre Assault
description:
Take control of any tank from a WWII era and start blowing up your enemies. Iron Warfare Theatre Assault is a semi-realistic tank game that gives the player an opportunity to control a semi-realistic tank controller rather than focusing on an arcade battle. The uniqueness of this game is how the player is able to control a large number of tanks, that will be available in future updates. Featuring various missions and a storyline that is created from the historical pages of WWII & the Cold War, you will be fighting alongside your allies to experience the tank battles once again.

*Iron Warfare: Theatre Assault does not require an Internet connection, you can play offline.

This game project is created by a small Burmese Indie Games Developer Team - so if you're a local, make sure to support us.
